nodes.text: Xoryn Rhas was a male Cathar living during the war against Zakuul. He was a member of the Eternal Alliance, where he held a position of the Emissary to both reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

Xoryn Rhas appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne on both the Carrick Station and the Vaiken Spacedock. He is not a vendor, not involved in any quests and can't be interacted with.
